title: TACVASEN Men's Summer Outdoor Shorts Quick Dry Cargo Casual Work Hiking Shorts (NO Belt)
description: Comfort Fit. Our Hiking shorts with partial elastic waistband, suit for most body shape, allowing full range of motion and providing a comfort fit.
Lightweight & Quick Dry. Lightweight and quick dry fabric delivers improved sense to skin and helps to keep you cool in hot summer.
Premium Fabric. This cargo shorts is made of 90% Nylon and 10% Spandex fabric. The durable and well-made fabric sturdy enough for outdoor activities.
Ingeniously Design. Our summer shorts features 2 front side pockets,1 back pockets with zipper closure, 2 pockets on the thigh.A lot of color options avaible.

【Mens Summer Shorts】Great for various outdoor activities, such as hiking, golf, cycling, climbing, fishing and work. The men's casual shorts also suitable for every day wear and a ideal gift for families and friends.
